name: ospike
description: An OAuth2 authorization server supporting OpenID Connect

scripts.init: npm run generate-certs && npm run build && npm run generate-env-dev && npm run generate-jwks
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.start-watch: npm run build && nodemon -e ts -w ./src -i ./src/**/*.spec.ts -x npm run watch-serve
scripts.build-dev: npm run generate-env-dev && npm run build
scripts.build-test: npm run generate-env-test && npm run build
scripts.build-prod: npm run generate-env-prod && npm run build
scripts.generate-env-dev: node ./scripts/generate_env.js -env dev -port 1337 -hostname localhost -mongoUrl MONGO_URL_HERE -username DB_USERNAME_HERE -password DB_PASSWORD_HERE -hostValidation 0 -logsDir LOGS_DIR_HERE -logsFileName LOGS_FILE_NAME_HERE -shragaUrl SHRAGA_URL_HERE
scripts.generate-env-test: node ./scripts/generate_env.js -env test -port 1337 -hostname localhost -mongoUrl MONGO_URL_HERE -username DB_USERNAME_HERE -password DB_PASSWORD_HERE -hostValidation 0 -logsDir LOGS_DIR_HERE -logsFileName LOGS_FILE_NAME_HERE -shragaUrl SHRAGA_URL_HERE
scripts.generate-env-prod: node ./scripts/generate_env.js -env prod -port 1337 -hostname 0.0.0.0 -mongoUrl MONGO_URL_HERE -username DB_USERNAME_HERE -password DB_PASSWORD_HERE -hostValidation 0 -apmServiceName APM_SERVICE_HERE -apmServerUrl APM_SERVER_URL_HERE -apmSecretToken APM_SECRET_TOKEN_HERE -logsDir LOGS_DIR_HERE -logsFileName LOGS_FILE_NAME_HERE -shragaUrl SHRAGA_URL_HERE
scripts.test: npm run build-test && mocha dist/test.js dist/**/*.spec.js -t 15000 -r dotenv/config --exit

author: Shaked Manes & Michael T
